Educational_Awareness_Program_About: The Trust organizes educational programs to spread awareness about the importance of education and the opportunities available to families below the poverty line and also organizes programs to promote literacy, skill development and art learning. Here, financial assistance and writing materials are distributed to needy students (class 10th and 12th) for registration.
About2: This organization works to create a prosperous society by empowering students, youth and women. For this, the trust is doing many social works. Such as - distribution of tricycles to the handicapped for transportation, distribution of clothes and blankets to the needy, organizing free health check-up camps in which many types of tests are done, medicine distribution, free eye check-up, spectacle distribution, free cataract operation in the hospital.
Program_About3: This organization works to create a prosperous society by empowering students, youth and women. For this, the trust is doing many works related to the society. Such as - distribution of tricycles to the handicapped for transportation, distribution of clothes and blankets to the needy, organizing free health check-up camps in which many types of tests are done, medicine distribution, free eye check-up, spectacles distribution, free cataract operation in the hospital.
Program_About4: Distribution of sewing machines to make women self-reliant, financial assistance to make rural women self-reliant and gift of necessary material to rural sisters and daughters on marriage ceremonies to make them self-reliant and empowered.
Program_About5: Financial assistance for registration of needy students (class 10th and 12th), writing material, purifier plant/RO in rural schools, running competition of students and late Suresh Singh Rural Night Cricket Tournament under the supervision of Patna Athletics Association, distribution of laptops (computers) to rural meritorious students for quality technical education, distribution of commercial vehicles (auto rickshaws) to earn livelihood and maintain the family.
Program_About6: Financial assistance for registration of needy students (class 10th and 12th), writing material, purifier plant/RO in rural schools, running competition of students and late Suresh Singh Rural Night Cricket Tournament under the supervision of Patna Athletics Association, distribution of laptops (computers) to rural meritorious students for quality technical education, distribution of commercial vehicles (auto rickshaws) to earn livelihood and maintain the family.
support2: Your support can change the course of a woman's life. Help us provide the education they deserve and the future they dream of.
title2: Financial Assistance to Make Women Self-Reliant
title5: Honoring Rural Women with Sewing Machines to Make Them Self-Reliant
title6: Water Coolers/RO for Pure Drinking Water in Rural Schools
title7: Distribution of Technical Equipment to Empower Farmers
title8: Installation of Borewell Pumps to Facilitate Religious Activities for Villagers
title11: Distribution of Tricycles to the Differently-Abled
title12: Distribution of Fogging Machines and Pesticide Equipment
title15: Providing Essential Items for a Bright Future During Sisters' Marriage Ceremonies
title16: Installation of LED Lights at Intersections for Better Mobility
about1: Medicines prescribed by doctors are provided to people during health check-ups organized by the Late Suresh Singh Foundation® Trust. This initiative is an essential part of the trust's mission.
about2: To ensure that women are not dependent on anyone for their livelihood, the trust provides financial assistance under women's empowerment programs to help needy women become self-reliant. This support enables them to establish self-employment and become independent. The trust is always committed to social welfare, especially to uphold women's dignity.
about3: Every year, the trust organizes race competitions for students aged 12 to 16 years. The Patna Athletics Association supervises these events impartially at the trust's request. The top ten students are honored with cash rewards, certificates, and medals in the presence of esteemed guests. This initiative promotes physical fitness and teaches valuable life skills like discipline.
about4: The trust conducts educational programs to spread awareness about the importance of education and opportunities available to families below the poverty line. Programs are organized to promote literacy, skill development, and art learning. Assistance funds and study materials are provided to needy students (class 10th and 12th) for their registration.
about5: Vocational training is essential for performing specialized tasks. It empowers individuals with skills and knowledge required for livelihood. The trust provides sewing machines to skilled and needy rural women to help them earn a livelihood and become self-reliant.
about6: The trust, which is consistently active in social and charitable work, has installed purifier plants/RO systems in rural schools to provide clean and cool drinking water for the health of rural students.
about7: To protect farmers' crops from pests and diseases, the trust has distributed battery-operated modern agricultural equipment for pesticide spraying. Additionally, agricultural knowledge is shared with the farmers. This has resulted in a significant increase in their yield, contributing to a prosperous society.
about8: The trust has installed borewells to provide uninterrupted clean drinking water and resolve issues related to religious activities in rural areas. The installation of borewells has significantly benefited local residents, especially women and children, giving them more time for religious practices (prayers and rituals).
about9: To address the immediate needs of needy people facing difficulties due to the cold, the trust distributed blankets. Additionally, the trust provided clothing to needy women as part of its commitment.
about10: The trust distributed commercial vehicles (auto rickshaws) to educated unemployed individuals in rural areas, enabling them to become self-reliant and support their families. This initiative is a step toward a self-reliant and prosperous society.
about11: To facilitate the mobility of differently-abled individuals (brothers and sisters) in rural areas, the trust provided tricycles, leading to significant improvement in their movement. These tricycles are specially designed considering the needs of different types of disabilities.
about12: To protect villagers from infectious diseases, the trust distributed fogging machines and pesticide equipment, which are used for regular fogging in villages. This initiative plays a significant role in keeping rural areas clean and healthy.
about13: Life on earth, be it humans, animals, birds, or any other living beings, cannot be imagined without trees. The trust organizes tree plantation programs to raise awareness about the importance of trees and environmental conservation.
about14: The trust's distribution of laptops (computers) has helped people connect with modern technology, providing them access to education, skill development, and economic opportunities. Through this initiative, the trust has promoted digital inclusion and socio-economic progress.
about15: On the auspicious occasion of weddings of daughters and sisters, the trust provides essential materials for their bright future and continues to do so in the future as well.
about16: To ensure safe and convenient travel for pedestrians during nighttime, the trust has installed LED lights at key intersections and crossroads.
why_Donate: Why Should You Donate to LSSF Trust?
h5_Donate: Supporting Girls' Marriages and Social Welfare
h6_Donate: A Holistic Approach to Community Development
h1_title: Education is a powerful tool for breaking the cycle of poverty. At LSSF Trust, we provide educational resources, scholarships, and support to underprivileged children, ensuring they have access to quality education. Your donation can help us create a brighter future for these young minds, equipping them with the skills and knowledge they need to succeed.
h2_title: Farmers are the backbone of our nation, and at LSSF Trust, we strive to support them with modern agricultural machinery. By providing tools and equipment, we help farmers increase their productivity and income, leading to improved livelihoods and food security. Your donation can make a difference in the lives of countless farmers, helping them achieve sustainable growth.
h3_title: We believe in empowering women to achieve financial independence and self-sufficiency. Our programs provide women with training in skills like sewing and tailoring, allowing them to earn a livelihood and support their families. Additionally, we distribute blankets in villages to ensure warmth and comfort for all. Your contribution can help us continue to uplift and empower women in our communities.
h4_title: At LSSF Trust, we organize running championships and provide cash prizes to encourage physical fitness and sportsmanship among youth and adults. These events not only promote a healthy lifestyle but also foster a sense of community and achievement. Your donation can support these events and motivate more people to participate in sports and stay active.
h5_title: We believe in supporting young women and their families during important life events. Our programs provide financial assistance for girls' marriages, helping them start their new journey with dignity and support. Additionally, we offer various social welfare programs to assist those in need, ensuring that everyone has access to basic necessities and opportunities.
h6_title: LSSF Trust is dedicated to addressing the diverse needs of our communities through a holistic approach. From providing educational resources and agricultural support to empowering women and promoting health and wellness, our initiatives aim to create a positive and lasting impact.
question_FAQ1: How can I donate money online to LSSF TRUST?
answer_FAQ1: You can donate to LSSF TRUST by visiting our official website www.lssftrust.org. Simply click on the 'Donate Now' button, choose your preferred donation amount, and follow the instructions to complete your donation. We accept various payment methods, including credit/debit cards and online banking.
question_FAQ2: Which are the best online donation tools for non-profits?
answer_FAQ2: For optimal vehicle health, it's recommended to schedule a standard service every 6 months or 10,000 kilometers, whichever comes first. Regular maintenance helps maintain performance, identify potential issues early, and extend the lifespan of your car.
question_FAQ3: What is the best online fundraising platform for LSSF TRUST?
answer_FAQ3: LSSF TRUST uses trusted and secure online fundraising platforms to facilitate donations. While we accept direct donations through our website, we also collaborate with platforms like GiveIndia and GlobalGiving, which are known for their reliability and wide reach. These platforms offer a seamless donation experience and ensure that your contributions reach us safely.
question_FAQ4: How can I get donations for an NGO like LSSF TRUST?
answer_FAQ4: To get donations for LSSF TRUST, we:
details_FAQ4: Build a Strong Online Presence: Ensure our website and social media are regularly updated with our activities and impact stories.
Engage with Donors: Communicate regularly with our donors, sharing success stories and updates.
Use Online Fundraising Platforms: Utilize platforms like GiveIndia, GlobalGiving, and others to reach a wider audience.
Host Virtual Events: Organize webinars, online auctions, and virtual meet-and-greets to engage potential donors.
question_FAQ5: What is the best online fundraising platform?
answer_FAQ5: For LSSF TRUST, the best online fundraising platforms include:
details_FAQ5: GiveIndia: A reputable platform that supports various non-profits in India.
GlobalGiving: An international platform that helps NGOs raise funds for specific projects.
Donorbox: A versatile platform that integrates easily with websites and supports recurring donations.
PayPal Giving Fund: Offers a trusted and global platform for receiving donations.
question_FAQ6: What is the best way to accept donations online for LSSF TRUST?
answer_FAQ6: The best way to accept donations online is through a secure, user-friendly platform that supports various payment methods. LSSF TRUST uses a combination of direct website donations, secure payment gateways like Razorpay, and trusted fundraising platforms like GiveIndia. This approach ensures flexibility and security for our donors.
question_FAQ7: Is it safe to donate online to LSSF TRUST?
answer_FAQ7: Yes, it is safe to donate online to LSSF TRUST. We use secure payment gateways and adhere to the latest security standards to protect your personal and financial information. Our website and partnered platforms employ SSL encryption and other security measures to ensure your data is safe.
question_FAQ8: Tips to Help Non-profits Get Donations Online
answer_FAQ8: To effectively secure online donations, LSSF TRUST employs the following strategies:
details_FAQ8: Clear and Compelling Message: Clearly articulate our mission and the impact of donations.
User-Friendly Website: Ensure our website is easy to navigate, with visible 'Donate Now' buttons.
Multiple Payment Options: Offer various payment methods to cater to different donors.
Regular Updates: Keep donors informed about how their contributions are making a difference.
Engage on Social Media: Use social media platforms to reach a broader audience and encourage donations.
